DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the pharmacokinetics in humans of San Huang Xie Jin Tang (SHXJT) and evaluate the bioequivalence between herbal concentrate and traditional decoction.
DOC.brief_title: The Pharmacokinetics Study of Concentrated Herbal Formula and Traditional Herbal Decoctions in Humans
DOC.criteria: The volunteers about 6~8 persons should be aged from 20 to 35 years old with a body weight between 50~80 kg, no marriage and have a healthy body condition.
